description: Learn how to set up your first product in Nexudus.
introduction_markdown:
This guide shows you how to set up your first product in Nexudus. Products can be anything from coffee or snacks to office supplies or rental services. By adding products to your Nexudus account, you can easily manage your inventory and sales, and offer your members a wider range of services. 

Follow these steps to add a new product:

1.  Navigate to **Inventory** in the Admin Panel.
2.  Click on **Products**.
3.  Click on **Add product**.
4.  Fill in the product details, including name, description, and price.
5.  Save the product.

sub_steps.step_description_markdown: From the dashboard, navigate to the **Inventory** section on the left sidebar.
Click on **Products** to view the list of available products.
Click the **Add product** button located on the top right of the screen.
Select **Manual entry** to create a new product from scratch.
In the **Product name** field, enter the name of the product. For example, type **Keycard Replacement Chart**.
In the **Product description** field, enter a description of the product. For example, type **A charge for customers having lost their key cards**.
In the **Unit price** field, enter the price of the product. For example, type **25**.
In the **The position to display this product at** field, enter the position to display this product at. For example, type **8**.
Click the **Save changes** button to save the new product.

title: Add New Product
